ygData.subject: Re: Digest Number 108
ygData.msgSnippet: In a message dated 08/03/1999 1:10:00 AM Pacific Daylight Time, ... I agree that paying those inflated prices for cool characters or extra platinum is quite
ygData.messageBody:
In a message dated 08/03/1999 1:10:00 AM Pacific Daylight Time,
warriors_eq@onelist.com writes:

> Ooh, good deal there. Someone would have to be a fool to buy anything from
> there. You do realise buying items from there for EQ is the lowest anyone
> can sink, it is paying good cash for something that doesn't actually exist.

I agree that paying those inflated prices for cool characters or extra
platinum is quite silly, although I disagree with your last sentence. You
payed the $50 for the game, right? You're paying the $9 per month to play
it, right? If your reasoning for not buying the stuff from eBay is that what
you buy doesn't exist, then forking over cash to Verant for the same thing
would be hypocritical.
